description:
cmd/vet: fix for changes to go/types package
Need to use (or stub) exact.Value.

messages.text:
Hello gri (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

LGTM

https://codereview.appspot.com/9126043/diff/1/src/cmd/vet/types.go
File src/cmd/vet/types.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/9126043/diff/1/src/cmd/vet/types.go#newcode22
src/cmd/vet/types.go:22: // depending on the go/types package.
See next comment.

https://codereview.appspot.com/9126043/diff/1/src/cmd/vet/types.go#newcode27
src/cmd/vet/types.go:27: // ExactValue is equivalent to exact.Value. Repeating it here allows us to
This file does depend on go/exact.

Repeating it here allows us to avoid depending on the go/exact package in other files.

?

Hello gri@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.
this can wait until after go 1.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=8e5aba451c65 ***

cmd/vet: fix for changes to go/types package
Need to use (or stub) exact.Value.
